alert.note: Alert for Blue Earth; Faribault; Freeborn; Waseca (Minnesota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued July 10 at 9:56PM CDT until July 10 at 10:30PM CDT by NWS Minneapolis
info.description: The National Weather Service in the Twin Cities has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Northeastern Faribault County in south central Minnesota... Northwestern Freeborn County in south central Minnesota... Southeastern Blue Earth County in south central Minnesota... Southwestern Waseca County in south central Minnesota... * Until 1030 PM CDT. * At 956 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located over Minnesota Lake, or 21 miles south of Mankato, moving southeast at 25 mph. HAZARD...Half dollar size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Damage to vehicles is expected. * This severe thunderstorm will be near... Waldorf around 1000 PM CDT. Easton around 1005 PM CDT. Other locations in the path of this severe thunderstorm include Wells and Freeborn. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.25 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...<50 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
